overview: After getting his butt whooped, Santa asks three guys, Tom, Dick and Harry to save Christmas by using his magical suit. The suit has the power to teleport anywhere, deliver presents and more. The men agree to help and Tom goes first, but decides to teleport to his ex-girlfriend’s house for makeup sex! Dick is next, and he quits delivering presents midway to fulfill his own naughty Christmas wish for a foursome with hot playmates. Finally it’s Harry’s turn and not only did he deliver all the presents, he was offered to take Santa’s place. Christmas is saved and the North Pole awaits Harry’s arrival, especially Mrs. Claus who’s warming up for post-holiday celebratory sex!
title: Dirty Santa
